alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 9:58AM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Clarke and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Leroy. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.1 feet this afternoon. It will then rise to a secondary crest of 26.5 feet early Tuesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 24 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob.
